greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, a(2n) = 1 + a(n), a(2n+1) = 1 + a(A332819(2n+1)); also binary width of terms of A332816.
comment: a(n) tells how many iterations of A332893 are needed before 1 is reached, i.e., the distance of n from 1 in binary trees like A332815.
Each n > 0 occurs 2^(n-1) times in total.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: For n >= 1, a(A108546(n)) = n; for all n >= 0, a(2^n) = n.
a(n) = 1 + a(n/2) if n is even, and a(n) = 1 + a(A332819(n)), if n is odd.
xref: A left inverse of A000079 and A108546.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 04 2020
